explanation: Opinions are split, but there are several bullish comments referencing potential major breakouts, targets up to 100k or even 1 million, and a focus on upward momentum if the dollar weakens. However, some participants are cautious about possible rejection and bearish control. No technical indicator consensus, but positive sentiment dominates short-term speculation.
representative_opinions: PolySopher: BTC to 1 million soon if dollar crashes. Still 1 BTC = less than a hous
Din Djarin: if we were to reject here over the next few days the bearish target would be around 101
oscartg638: bears are in control. I meant to say. sorry
Islandsteve: THIS BETTER BREAKOUT OR IM GOING TO BED
